issue.title: [CF 71] buttons sometime stop workig
issue.body:
It feels a bit unreliable atm. I have "improved soul fire" set to show when the buff is on. However I've noticed several times when it doesn't. It seems to be related to ressurection/zone change/pvp respawn/talent respec.

Note that the button doesn't show up when I click the buff off and get it on again either. However if do 2x /tmw it works fine.

What version of the product are you using?
2.3.3


> Posted by CurseForge user neuron2 | Imported from CurseForge issue #71 | Raw

comments.body:
Strange. I'll look into it when I have time.

Edited Dec 29, 2010

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Please post your saved variables as I asked you to, instead of just erasing the entire ticket template.

It shows up again just fine for me after clicking it off again. Are you sure that you have the buff when TMW is not showing it? Respeccing with the buff active does not cause it to hide for me. Changing zones does not cause it to hide for me. Rezzing should cause it to dissapear because it is a buff on you; buffs do not persist through death. I am assuming that you mean the same thing by "pvp respawn".
